definition: to check up on sb's achievements
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: With the results of staff appraisal, I understand my professional development needs.
sentences.chinese: 藉著考绩结果，我了解自己的专业发展需要。

sentences.english: The staff appraisal system including assessment criteria and procedures is clear.
sentences.chinese: 教职员考绩制度，包括评估准则和程序均清楚。

sentences.english: Personal expertise can not be qualified for positions they bear. 3. Frail incompetent or performance as the C class Di.
sentences.chinese: 身体衰弱，不能胜任工作的，或考绩列为丙等的。

sentences.english: Many companies make an annual evaluation of their employees.
sentences.chinese: 很多公司每年都会针对员工的表现来打考绩。

sentences.english: We're doing our annual evaluation of all employees.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在正在替每位员工打考绩。

sentences.english: I fully understand the appraisal system including assessment criteria and procedures.
sentences.chinese: 我清楚了解教职员考绩制度，包括评估准则和程序。

definition: an official position/a job in the bureaucracy
